name: [> Breakdown <]
description:
> BREAKDOWN <

Ahh, playing the old version of snake. All old memories are back, except not. Your electricity supplier hates u. Do your best to restore the power so you can enjoy the game of snake like never before ;)

WARNING: It is recommended for you to download the game since you can access settings, such as volume and experimental physics. Downloadable version also comes with graphics improvements 👍

==== UDC jam Army ====
Piotrek4
Kiyan
iceBRG
====================

WHICH VERSION TO DOWNLOAD?

If you're wondering what Breakdown_Darkened (Not Recommended) is, then here's the answer: The darkened version has post processing turned on, making everything extremely dark. You cannot basically see anything o.o

thanks for playing!
